channel.title: Resumes on Jia-Baos
channel.description: Recent content in Resumes on Jia-Baos

item.title: Biography
item.description: Notes: Here is a link to my Github homepage, Jia-Baos. I received the B.E. degree from Civil Aviation Flight University of China, Guanghan, China, in 2019, and currently pursuing the M.E. degree in College of Intelligent Equipment, Shandong University of Science and Technology. My research interests include image registration, image stitching, and optical flow estimation.

item.title: Basical Skills
item.description: Notes: Here is a link to my Github homepage, Jia-Baos. 熟练使用C++、熟悉STL中的各种容器 熟悉Python、Shell、Rust等编程语言 熟悉Opencv、PaddleOCR、Pytorch等三方库 熟悉CMake、MinGW、Git等编译、版本控制工具 熟悉图像配准、图像拼接、光流估计等图像任务 熟悉计算成像过程、3A、ISP、双目、结构光等技术
